modName: Cloud - Final Fantasy 7 Hair and Clothes ModdersResouce
summary: This only contains models and textures for Cloud's FF7 Soldier Armor I made a long time back, this will not work without an esp. You are free to use these resources but please credit me and provide a link to this page
descriptionHtml:
CloudFF7Clothes&Hair ModdersResource
by hardarg


================================
[color=orange][b]D E S C R I P T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
This is my last entry for Skyrim modding community. Its been fun everyone, thank you all who DL, endorsed and appreciated my works. :)

At long last, this modders resource contains meshes and textures of my Cloud's Soldier outfit and hairstyle from Final Fantasy 7, based on his FF7 appearance.

This is [b]ONLY[/b] model and texture, you need the[b] Creation Kit[/b] to put up a working ESP to make them appear in your game. You are free to use these resources, no need to PM me, all I ask that you [b]credit me and provide a link[/b] in your mod page. :)

Just a heads up, The hair mesh has been revised and strongly recommend using it than the hair in my Cloud mod.

UPDATE: Jckspacy made a working .esp for my mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70224/? , thank you Jckspacy!


================================
[color=orange][b]R E C O M M E N D[/b][/color]
================================
